scripts.prune: rm -rf node_modules && npm run prune:sub && npm run prune:build
scripts.stats:dev: npm run start-checks && npm run dev -w apps/stats
scripts.stats:migration:create: npm run start-checks && npm run migration:create -w apps/stats
scripts.stats:ts:noWatch: npm run start-checks && npm run ts:noWatch -w apps/stats
scripts.stats:start: npm run start-checks && npm run start -w apps/stats
scripts.start-checks: node helpers/start-checks.js && node helpers/check-package-versions.js && node helpers/modify-node-modules/index.js --check
scripts.prepare: node -e "try { require('husky').install(); } catch(e) { if(e.code !== 'MODULE_NOT_FOUND') throw e; }"
